text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy —Trump fired Pandemic team
—Trump removed infectious disease protections for nursing homes
—Trump fired our Chinese Pandemic public health official
—Trump refused tests/not prepared
—Trump’s 70-day delay caused over MILLION exposed and over 60,000 DEATHS (and counting)
#COVID19 https://t.co/tuyfmqh9zF
